title: To Duration -- Peter Handke
content: Today in the mail, Peter Handke's To Duration, translated by Scott Abbott, and published by The Last Books/Cannon Magazine (Website unfortunately doesn't always work). Very beautiful work from all involved and it was well worth waiting for it. To Duration is The Last Books' second Handke publication (among all the other wonderful things they do), their first was a reprinting of Handke's Repetition (Ralph Manheim translation).
